statements: SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE learner_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_id, learner_id, quiz_score FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_score > 80;
SELECT quiz_id, feedback FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_score < 70 ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT learner_id, feedback FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6;
SELECT quiz_id, learner_id, quiz_score, feedback FROM quiz_scores ORDER BY quiz_score DESC, learner_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE learner_id = 1 ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT learner_id, quiz_score FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_score > 80 ORDER BY learner_id ASC, quiz_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT learner_id, COUNT(quiz_id) AS total_quizzes FROM quiz_scores GROUP BY learner_id HAVING total_quizzes > 3;
SELECT learner_id, AVG(quiz_score) AS average_score FROM quiz_scores GROUP BY learner_id ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL AND feedback <> '' ORDER BY quiz_id ASC, learner_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT user_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, score FROM quiz_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC, feedback_text ASC;
SELECT quiz_id, user_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE user_id = 3 AND score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(quiz_id) AS quiz_count FROM quiz_scores GROUP BY user_id HAVING quiz_count > 2;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT user_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_name, email, score FROM users JOIN quiz_scores ON users.user_id = quiz_scores.user_id;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_name, feedback_text FROM users JOIN feedback ON users.user_id = feedback.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic, total_questions FROM Quizzes ORDER BY quiz_topic DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM QuizScores GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM QuizScores WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT score, timestamp FROM QuizScores WHERE quiz_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM Quizzes WHERE total_questions > 10 ORDER BY quiz_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM quizzes;
SELECT student_id, quiz_name, score FROM quizzes WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT quiz_name, score FROM quizzes WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM quizzes ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT quiz_name, score FROM quizzes JOIN feedback ON quizzes.quiz_id = feedback.quiz_id WHERE quiz_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT quiz_name, student_name, feedback_text FROM quizzes JOIN feedback ON quizzes.quiz_id = feedback.quiz_id JOIN students ON feedback.student_id = students.student_id ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM students JOIN quiz_attempts ON students.student_id = quiz_attempts.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_attempts > 3;
